name: Albert
overview: "Albert" is a PAL-only game released both in a free and commercial version (the commercial version has an additional 10 levels). It features fairly simple platform gameplay; the character Albert runs about gathering gemstones while avoiding insects. While the gameplay is fairly standard, the graphics are exceptional and look more like a 16-bit game instead of over 40-year-old 8bit hardware. The screens are very colorful and detailed, sprites are large, and scrolling smooth as you play through.
